Luhe county in Shanwei 汕尾, Guangdong

sentences.english: The Yellow River becomes a continental river in low-water seasons.
sentences.chinese: 在枯水期，黄河也成了“内陆河”了。

sentences.english: Tarim River is the longest inland River of China, located in the arid of Northwest China.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木河地处我国西北干旱区，是中国最长的内陆河。

sentences.english: Tarim River is one longest inland river of China.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木河是我国最长的内陆河。

sentences.english: Limnology also includes studying the chemical and physical aspects of inland water.
sentences.chinese: 湖沼学也包含对内陆河理化属性方面的研究。

sentences.english: The Heihe River is a wide inland river in Northwest China.
sentences.chinese: 黑河是我国西北地区一个较大的内陆河。

sentences.english: Water resource distribution in continental river valley has its own complexities and particularities.
sentences.chinese: 内陆河流域水资源配置有其自身的复杂性和特殊性。
